duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and monitor progress of operational projects, meetings, and travel arrangements.
Manage office records, create and ensure accuracy in the preparation of written materials.
Act as liaison for internal and external communications and fiscal transactions.
Review and edit documents prepared by the Director for content and format.
Hire, train, supervise, and assign tasks to student workers.
Maintain a calendar of operating commitments and research information for decision-making.
Perform other related duties as assigned.
Work collaboratively with other University Housing units.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent. Two (2) years (24 months) of work experience comparable to the third level of this series.
